# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $12,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you today. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time, so I encourage you to consider this fantastic deal before it expires. Should you choose to accept, I assure you a seamless transaction and prompt delivery. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
